

The Mirth Connect® FHIR® Connector includes the following, which are 
distributed under the terms of the Apache License version 2.0 
(see APACHE-LICENSE-2.0.txt):

	Attoparser 2.0.4 (http://www.attoparser.org/)
	Gson 2.8.1 (https://github.com/google/gson)
	HAPI FHIR 3.2.0 (http://hapifhir.io/)
	Object Graph Navigation Library 3.1.12 (http://ognl.org/)
	Thymeleaf 3.0.7 (http://www.thymeleaf.org/)
	unbescape 1.1.5 (http://www.unbescape.org/)
	Woodstox 5.0.3 (https://github.com/FasterXML/woodstox)


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


The Mirth Connect® FHIR® Connector includes a modified version of a file 
from HAPI FHIR 3.2.0, which is distributed under the terms of the Apache License 
version 2.0 (see APACHE-LICENSE-2.0.txt). The following file has changed:

	ca/uhn/fhir/narrative/BaseThymeleafNarrativeGenerator.java
	
	Changes: Private fields and methods have been made protected for better 
	subclass support.
